1085dfcd-fec6-4ac6-ab5c-f15d00179634.description: The Advanced Leadership Certification (ALC) builds on the work participants have completed in the Foundational Leadership Certification program. In ALC, participants will complete 12 Harvard ManageMentor® courses on a variety of topics, including Strategic Thinking, Change Management, and Attracting and Cultivating Talent. There are opportunities to attend online interactive workshops on each course topic where participants will collaborate with other leaders from across The Salvation Army.
1085dfcd-fec6-4ac6-ab5c-f15d00179634.name: Advanced Leadership Certification

issuer.summary: issued by Leadership Development | The Salvation Army Canada and Bermuda

entity.name: Leadership Development | The Salvation Army Canada and Bermuda

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 12 Harvard ManageMentor® courses (10 required, 2 electives): Change Management, Decision Making, Strategic Thinking, Developing Employees, Strategy Planning and Execution, Stress Management, Team Management, Attracting and Cultivating Talent, Crisis Management, Delegating
Complete an assessment at the end of each course to demonstrate knowledge and understanding of leadership best practices
Participate in 3 interactive online Leadership Café Workshops on a variety of topics (90 min. each)
Create and implement 6 On-The-Job Action Plans (one for each course)

f7d21928-c766-4290-9464-79d2b84b40e1.description: This program is designed for people entering, or curious about moving towards, a leadership role in The Salvation Army in Canada and Bermuda. Our Emerging Leaders groups are built for officers and employees from across the Territory who are embarking on their leadership journeys. This program combines virtual learning sessions with two in-person, multi-day gatherings at various locations in the Territory.
f7d21928-c766-4290-9464-79d2b84b40e1.name: Emerging Leaders Level 1

issuer.summary: issued by Leadership Development | The Salvation Army Canada and Bermuda

entity.name: Leadership Development | The Salvation Army Canada and Bermuda

badge_template_activities.title: Emerging Leaders is offered on an invitation only basis from your manager or supervisor. Your manager or supervisor will provide you with all forms you need to complete the application process.

6a89faa1-3160-46ee-8799-d9248bb9959a.description: This program is a continuation for graduates of our Emerging Leaders Level 1 training. Our Emerging Leaders groups are built for officers and employees from across the Territory who are continuing on their leadership journeys. The Army sees leadership as attitudes and capabilities that can be developed through quality education and in-depth discussions. As with Level 1, this program combines virtual learning with two in-person multi-day gatherings at various locations in the Territory.
6a89faa1-3160-46ee-8799-d9248bb9959a.name: Emerging Leaders Level 2

issuer.summary: issued by Leadership Development | The Salvation Army Canada and Bermuda

entity.name: Leadership Development | The Salvation Army Canada and Bermuda

badge_template_activities.title: The prerequisite for attending this program is the completion of Emerging Leaders Level 1.

78adf944-0216-4276-8feb-9b3e340c80cf.description: Earners of this badge learn essential leadership skills like providing feedback, EDJI awareness, working through difficult interactions, and taking a coaching approach to leadership. Participants will complete six Harvard ManageMentor® courses, create and implement On-The-Job Action Plans, and collaborate with other leaders from The Salvation Army through online workshops. This self-directed program takes between 6 months and 2 years to complete.
78adf944-0216-4276-8feb-9b3e340c80cf.name: Foundational Leadership Certification

issuer.summary: issued by Leadership Development | The Salvation Army Canada and Bermuda

entity.name: Leadership Development | The Salvation Army Canada and Bermuda

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 6 Harvard ManageMentor® courses: Leading People, Difficult Interactions, Coaching, Feedback Essentials, Performance Appraisal, and Diversity, Inclusion & Belonging.
Complete an assessment at the end of each course to demonstrate knowledge and understanding of leadership best practices
Participate in 3 interactive online Leadership Café Workshops on a variety of topics (90 min. each)
Create and implement 6 On-The-Job Action Plans (one for each course)

4a468d27-84f5-4a60-898c-99dc6db86984.description: The LEADS framework is the first step towards building and encouraging responsible leadership in ourselves and our ministries. LEADS is how we shape and define what dynamic leadership looks like in The Salvation Army in Canada and Bermuda. It equips leaders with the perfect recipe of skills, behaviours, abilities, and knowledge necessary to lead. The LEADS Learning series is a two-day, in-person, participatory workshop offered in various locations across the Territory.
4a468d27-84f5-4a60-898c-99dc6db86984.name: LEADS Learning Series

issuer.summary: issued by Leadership Development | The Salvation Army Canada and Bermuda

entity.name: Leadership Development | The Salvation Army Canada and Bermuda

badge_template_activities.title: First, watch all five LEADS domain videos through the LEADS Capability Framework page. If you want to learn more, discuss the opportunity with your manager and supervisor.

548464ad-828b-4c84-b061-3f7924c700c6.description: The LEADS framework is the first step towards building and encouraging responsible leadership in ourselves and our ministries. LEADS is how we shape and define what dynamic leadership looks like in The Salvation Army in Canada and Bermuda. It equips leaders with the perfect recipe of skills, behaviours, abilities, and knowledge necessary to lead. The LEADS Orientation is a 2-hour, in-person overview of LEADS offered by Leadership Development.
548464ad-828b-4c84-b061-3f7924c700c6.name: LEADS Orientation

issuer.summary: issued by Leadership Development | The Salvation Army Canada and Bermuda

entity.name: Leadership Development | The Salvation Army Canada and Bermuda
